Anne d taqcict tamecṭuḥt.

Annect nezmer i zemren.
Annect-a akken i nezmer ad d-nini yelha imi tteffɣen ɣef yidelsan n lbeṛṛani.
Annect-a ihi, s wudem ibanen, icudd ɣer yidles n tmetti, n ugdud, d tɣerma s timmad.
Annect-a nessen-it.
Annect-a ur yelli d ayla-k.

Annect-a yark, af udem-im!
Annect-a, yelha i tmeẓriwt, yelha i tmesliwt daɣ, acku meqqer, yeɛmer.
Annect-agi meṛṛa.
Annect-agi, ad ibeggen belli tutlayt d tasudut tanmettit, ur yezmir ara yiwen umdan weḥd-s ad tt-ibeddel.
Annect-agi, yella-d s lemɛawna gar Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Ugezdu d yiselwayen n tɣiwanin d yimezdaɣ-nneɣ diɣen.
Annenct-a meṛṛa i d-bedreɣ, yettarra tizlit ɣer deffir.

Arrac ttazallen ḥafi.
Arrac tturaren deg ufrag.
Arrac tturaren, ttfarasen skud zhan yimawlan-nsen deg yimenɣi.
Arrac unti-is d tullas.
Arrac ur rewwun turart.
Arrac ḥemmlen ccakula.
Arrac ḥemmlen tiqaqqacin.
Arrac, qqimen smuzguten s tsusmi, ṭṭafaren-tt kan s wallen.
Arrac, tturaren ur ɛeyyun.
Arrac-a ttuṛebban mliḥ.
Arrac-a, d arraw-iw.
Arrac-a, d arraw-nneɣ.
Arrac-iw mɣuren merra.
Arrac-nni rran ɣer ugafa.
Arrac-nni ttimɣuren.
Arrac-nni ččan kan rfis-nni, qrumten din.
Arrac-nni, d arraw-iw.
Arrac-nni.
Arraw n Aram: Ɛuṣ, Ḥul, Gitir akked Mac.
Arraw n Bariɛa: Ḥibir akked Malkiyil.
Arraw n Cim: Ɛiylam, Acur, Arfaxcad, Lud akked Aram.
Arraw n Dda Lmulud: Mhenni, Muḥend Aɛṛab, Lwennas, Uleḥlu akked nekk.
Arraw n Gumir: Ackanaz, Rifat akked Tugarma.
Arraw n Isasxaṛ: Tulaɛ, Fuwa, Yub akked Cimrun.
Arraw n Isṛayil xedmen akken.
Arraw n Lalla Xelluǧa tameṭṭut n Si Mḥemmed: Yusef akked Binyamin.
Arraw n Lewwi: Gircun, Qahat, Marari.
Arraw n Naftali: Yaḥṣayil, Guni, Yiṣir akked Cilim.
Arraw n Rawubin: Ḥanux, Falu, Ḥiṣrun, Karmi.
Arraw n Raɛma: Caba akked Dadan.
Arraw n Said Uqasi: Yidir, Ǧaɛfaṛ, Smaɛil akked Mexluf.
Arraw n Yahuda: Ɛir, Unan, Cila, Firiṣ akked Ziraḥ.
Arraw n Yuba d imelḥanen.
Arraw n Zabulun: Sirid, Ilun akked Yaḥliyil.
Arraw n takniwin, ur ttemsendahen.
Arraw n tsedda.
Arraw n tsekkurt.
Arraw n Ḥam: Kuc, Miṣrayim, Fut akked Kanɛan.
Arraw-ines di geddac yid-sen.
Arraw-inu d nneɛma.
Arraw-is werǧin semmḥen di yemma-tsen.
Arraw-iw d akniwen.
Arraw-iw d iqbayliyen.
Arraw-iw nneɣnin.
Arraw-iw.
Arraw-nnek ssnen talmanit?
Arraw-nnes d ineglusen.
Arraz "Meksa Ɛabdelqader" i yicennayen ilmeẓyen.
Arraz Racid Ɛellic yesɛa azal meqqren ama i umaru, neɣ i yimeɣriyen, akked tutlayt n teqbaylit.
Arraz amenzu i terbaɛt n uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Buzgan.
Arraz n Aysat Rabaḥ n tezdeg deg uḥric n useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt.
Arraz n tseqqamut n uktazal, yewwi-t ugraw Imuhal n uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Umecras.
Arraz n umẓawan yufraren, yewwi-t Ḥamuda Racid n uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Yiferḥunen.
Arraz n wallal n uẓawan, ad rnun ad t-fken i yiwet gar snat n tewsatin-agi i d-nebder.
Arraz n yilemẓi ifazen yuɣal i Kurd Muḥemmed n uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Blida.
Arraz wis kraḍ, yuɣal i terbaɛt n Yiɛeẓẓugen.
Arraz-a, yerra-yi-d asirem deg tiddin n tmetti taqbaylit ɣer tlelli n tikti d wawal.
Arraz-agi, deg tezrigt-is tamezwarut, ad iḥaz aṭas n yiḥricen.

Asmi akken qqaren medden, nekk zgiɣ d isem-im ay kettbeɣ.

Asmi ara rebḥeɣ ad nwali.
Asmi ara tuɣaleḍ ɣur-s, ad k-kkateɣ alamma teεreq-ak yemma-k.

Asmi bdiɣ asuqel i ẓriɣ taqbaylit d tutlayt iǧehden, yesɛan allalen-is.
Asmi d-lulen, ufan-d iman-nsen myeḥmalen.
Asmi d-tewwet lgerra s waṭas, neflen-d yisaffen.
Asmi d-yeḥḍeṛ ukeččum γer ustudyu tekkes-as-tt tebγest.
Asmi d-yewweḍ wejraḍ tamurt, lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ.

Atug n rrbeḥ di lwilya-agi n Tizi Uzzu, yewweḍ ɣer tesεa u tmanyin ticcer teεa u sebεin ɣef mya.
Atug n rrbeḥ yewweḍ ɣer settin ticcert sebεa u tlatin ɣef mya..

Axaṭaṛ ikad dakken ẓẓay.
Axaṭer Ameɣlal ikkes dderya i tlawin meṛṛa n twacult n Dda Ḥemmu ɣef ddemma n Ṣara, tameṭṭut n Abṛaham.
Axaṭer Ameɣlal iwala-d i lḥif-im.
Axaṭer Ibeṛquqen d iqeddacen-iw.
Axaṭer Illu iburek-iyi aṭas, ur yi-ixuṣṣ wacemma.
Axaṭer Illu yexdem amdan ɣef ṣṣifa-s.
Axaṭer Si Salaḥ ittwaɛzel d imqeddes i Yillu-is.
Axaṭer ad k-rreɣ d ababat n waṭas n yigduden.
Axaṭer ad t-rreɣ d lǧens ameqran.
Axaṭer akka i yi-d-ittunefk lameṛ.
Axaṭer akken i tettḥasabem ara tettuḥasbem.
Axaṭer anda yella ugerruj-ik, dinna i yella wul-ik.
Axaṭer annect-nni n wussan i yelaqen i uɛeṭṭer n lmegget.
Axaṭer aql-ak am Ferɛun.
Axaṭer axeddam yuklal lqut-is.
Axaṭer d aqeddac-ik, i yeḍemnen baba ɣef uqcic-agi.
Axaṭer d aseggas n ṣṣab, ad wen-yili d imqeddes.
Axaṭer d ayen iqedsen nezzeh.
Axaṭer d iqeddacen-iw i d-ssufɣeɣ si tmurt n Maṣer.
Axaṭer d leḥsab n lɣellat i k-d-izzenz.
Axaṭer ddnub n Imuriyen mazal ur iwwiḍ ara ɣer lḥedd-is.
Axaṭer deg unagraw n tutlayin, tufa-d iman-is teṭṭef tama n wadda.
Axaṭer di setta n wussan, Ameɣlal ixleq-d igenwan, lqaɛa, lebḥuṛ akked wayen meṛṛa i ten-iɛemṛen.
Axaṭer dinna i s-d-iḍher Yillu, mi akken yerwel ɣef gma-s.
Axaṭer inna-d: Nekk, d Mmi-s n Yillu.
Axaṭer iɣli-d laẓ di tmurt n Kanɛan.
Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ, tefkam-iyi ččiɣ.
Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ, ur yi-tefkim ara ad ččeɣ.
Axaṭer lɣaci ḥesben-t d nnbi.
Axaṭer mi ara ṛuḥent ad swent, ulli-nni sseḍfarent.
Axaṭer nedmeɣ imi i ten-id-xedmeɣ.
Axaṭer nnuɣen yid-s.
Axaṭer s ided n lmefṣel n taɣma i yettwet Si Mḥemmed.
Axaṭer seg urrif-nni i rfan, nɣan irgazen;
Axaṭer tettwadehnem s zzit timqeddest n Umeɣlal.
Axaṭer tikli n yemdanen meṛṛa tefsed di ddunit.
Axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq deg idammen i tella.
Axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq, d idammen-nni yellan deg-s.
Axaṭer tugwad dɣa inna-yas: Nniɣ-am teḍṣiḍ!
Axaṭer ul n ugdud-agi yeqqur!
Axaṭer ur tt-fkiɣ ara i mmi Cila, ad izweǧ yid-s.
Axaṭer ur tt-iɛqil ara belli d tislit-is.
Axaṭer walaɣ ayen akk i k-ixdem Laban.
Axaṭer wid yebɣan ad ddmen leɛmeṛ n uqcic, mmuten.
Axaṭer win yebɣan ad isellek taṛwiḥt-is ad tt-isṛuḥ.
Axaṭer zewǧen akk yid-s.
Axaṭer ɣef ddemma n wayen akken i xedmen i ten-keṛheɣ.
Axaṭer ɣef ddemma n yemdanen, ddunit teččuṛ d lbaṭel.

Axi buh!
Axi tessewḥac luḍa, tesgem azezzu.
Axir ad tettuḍ Sami.
Axir ad ččeɣ abelluḍ wala akka d abeṛṛani.
Axir akken.
Axir llesqa, tazeqqa.
Axir tineqlebt wala yir ṛṛay.
Axir-iyi ad ččeɣ weḥd-i.
Axiṛ lexsaṛa, wala lefḍiḥa.
Axnunnes, d ayen i yessettwaɣayen tamnaḍt-nneɣ akked tdawsa-nneɣ.
Axnunnes, yezmer ad yili deg uzwu, deg waman, deg lqaεa, deg yimeẓẓuɣen, deg wallen.
Axtan-nni i ɣ-xetnen akken, d ajerrem i ttjerrimen deg-neɣ.
Axxam
Axxam ajdid issewḥac.
Axxam akk gnen.
Axxam akk yerɣa.
Axxam ara tkecmeḍ, am yiṭij n ṣṣbeḥ.

Ayɣeṛ ad teffreḍ fell-i?
Ayɣeṛ akka tura tugi.
Ayɣeṛ ara txemmemeḍ akka?
Ayɣeṛ i teṭṭalayem Si Ḥmed Waɛli?

Ayɣeṛ i teṭṭalayeḍ Tom?
Ayɣeṛ yugi Yuba ad iṛuḥ?
Azaglu-ines d idmimen.
Azaglu-iw leggaɣ, yerna taɛekkemt-iw fessuset.
Azagur-is yesɛa ticṛaḍ.
Azal n sin n yimulas.
Azal n sin wussan uriɣ-d aḍris yecban wa maca yemxallaf deg usentel.
Azal n teqbaylit mačči deg teɣzi n tqendurt-is i yella.
Azal n tezlit simmal ineqqes s usemres n upirati deg yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen, ɣef waya, aḍebsi ur yettnuzu ara.
Azal n tlaba ittban di ccetwa.
Azal n tmanyin deg meyya n yidlisen ara yersen di temkarḍit tamaynut, ad d-ttwaddmen seg tsekla taqbaylit.
Azal n tmeṭṭut yerna, iɛedda i usigna, abrid-is metwal itri.
Azal n tmusni, tamusni!
Azal n umdan yegrareb, Kennu yuɣal d lεada.
Azal n uzgen n ssaɛa umbeεd, leḥqen-d yimsexsiyen n tmes i tt-id-yufan texsi.
Azal-nsen ad ittwaḥseb akken yella lexlaṣ n uxeddam.
Azalen yesɛa uḍris.
Azalen, fessin am udfel deg yiṭij.
Azarug i d-yellan, deg semmus deg yulyu, agim d tẓa twinas d seddis tmerwin d sin.
Azawad, d tamennaṭ ideg zedɣen Yimaziɣen n Mali.
Azaɣar n Sidim iččuṛ d lebyur n uselɣaɣ.
Azberbur d tiẓurin urɛad wwint, mazal-itent d tisemmamin.
Azeggaɣ axir.
Azeggaɣ mačči d tiɣmi-k.
Azegzaw yerna fell-ak.
Azegḍuf d yiwen n yimɣi iteqsen.
Azekka ad as-aruɣ.
Azekka ad as-ɣreɣ i Dda Racid.
Azekka ad asent-d-yaɣ akk ayen steḥqent.
Azekka ad d-qqleɣ zik.
Azekka ad d-qqleɣ.
Azekka ad d-tewwet lehwa.
Azekka ad d-teɣli lehwa.
Azekka ad d-yas.
Azekka ad dduɣ ɣer lbilaǧ akked baba.
Azekka ad hedreɣ i Si Ḥmed Waɛli.
Azekka ad hedreɣ i Tom.
Azekka ad ifat lḥal.
Azekka ad iliɣ da.
Azekka ad iliɣ di lbiru alarma d setta.
Azekka ad iliɣ din.
Azekka ad kecmeɣ ɣer lakul i tikelt tamenzut.
Azekka ad n-uɣaleɣ.
Azekka ad nesbeɣ asefreg.
Azekka ad nessilel.
Azekka ad nexdem akayad.
Azekka ad nqabel acengu.
Azekka ad rewleɣ.
Azekka ad ruḥeɣ ar Tokyo.
Azekka ad ruḥeɣ. Anwa ara yeddun yid-i?
Azekka ad sebɣen asefreg.
Azekka ad sebɣent asefreg.
Azekka ad sebɣeɣ asefreg.
Azekka ad tesbeɣ asefreg.
Azekka ad tessudneḍ.
Azekka ad tesɛuḍ ccɣel.
Azekka ad truḥ ad taf tilelli-s d talwit-is dinna.
Azekka ad tsebɣeḍ asefreg.
Azekka ad tt-issaɣ wedfel.
Azekka ad tuɣaleḍ d tameṭṭut n umarkanti.
Azekka ad uraren ddabax n uḍar.
Azekka ad uɣaleɣ s axxam.
Azekka ad yas ɣur-wen.
Azekka ad yerzu ɣur-k.
Azekka ad yerzu ɣur-m.
Azekka ad yerzu ɣur-wen.
Azekka ad yesbeɣ asefreg.
Azekka ad yewt udfel.
Azekka ad yexdem
Azekka ad ɣreɣ aṭas.
Azekka aql-iyi d axeddam.
Azekka ara bdunt temsirin.
Azekka ara bdunt tezrawin.
Azekka ara d-ruḥeɣ ɣer temqeddemt n tmurt n Kanada.
Azekka ara yebdu uɣerbaz.
Azekka ara yeqleɛ Yidir.
Azekka d amulli-inu.
Azekka d ass n tɣimit.
Azekka d ass n usteɛfu, d ass wis sebɛa yettwaɛezlen i Umeɣlal.
Azekka d ass nniḍen.
Azekka d aẓekka.
Azekka d lficṭa.
Azekka d lḥedd.
Azekka dayen ifut lḥal.
Azekka iɣeṭṭel-d lxuf, uggadeɣ ad nessesel am uzrem.
Azekka n ttlata ad tili tmeɣra meqqren ara d-yilin i lfayda n yimeḍharen.
Azekka ruḥemt ar dina!
Azekka ulac amahil.
Azekka ulac aɣerbaz.
Azekka ulac tizrawin.
Azekka zik ad d-kkreɣ.
Azekka ṣṣbeḥ tzemreḍ ad d-tuɣaleḍ.
Azekka ṣṣbeḥ zik, mi d-tekkrem ad tkemmlem abrid-nwen.
Azekka, ad d-nawi tislit.
Azekka, ad d-nekreɣ zik.
Azekka, ad d-neqḍu.
Azekka, ad d-qḍun.
Azekka, ad d-qḍunt.
Azekka, ad d-qḍuɣ.
Azekka, ad d-teqḍu Linda.
Azekka, ad d-teqḍu.
Azekka, ad d-teqḍum.
Azekka, ad d-teqḍumt.
Azekka, ad d-yeqḍu Dan.
Azekka, ad d-yeqḍu.
Azekka, ad irzu ɣer tmurt.
Azekka, ad k-jjeɣ.
Azekka, ad neddu zik, naɣ?
Azekka, ad ssiwleɣ yid-k.
Azekka, ad ssiwleɣ yid-m.
Azekka, ad tilim akk da?
Azekka, ad ɛumeɣ yid-s.
Azekka, d acu tenniḍ?
Azekka, nekk ad beddeɣ ɣef tiɣilt, aɛekkaz n Yillu deg ufus-iw.
Azekka-nni daɣen, yerra ɣer lqahwa yexdem.
Azekka-nni kkreɣ-d zik akken ad rewleɣ.
Azekka-nni lewhi n tesɛa nemlal-d ɣer lḥara n tseddawit.
Azekka-nni sudaba terǧa sdat n uxxam n urgaz n Zahra.
Azekka-nni yekker-d mmi-s n uciban iruḥ srid ɣer lqahwa.
Azekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ, Ferɛun ikker-d itqelleq.
Azekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ, d nnda i d-izzin i umkan-nni anda i llan.
Azekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ, mi iṛuḥ Yusef ɣur-sen, yufa-ten tqelqen.
Azekka-nni, Ameɣlal ixdem akken i d-inna.
Azekka-nni, kkren-d ṣṣbeḥ zik, mɛahaden.
Azekka-nni, krent ad ruḥent, ɣer wasif.
Azekka-nni, yewweḍ-d Dda Lḥusin.
Azekkan-nni tasebḥit tbed-as i wemjay ɣef umnar.
Azelmaḍ yettḥami ɣef uyeffus.
Azemmur d aseṛṛaǧi.
Azemmur n usammar yif win n umalu.
Azemmur-nneɣ tečča-t tmes.
Azemz ad d-ttunefk deqqal.
Azemz n yikayaden.
Azen Yuba d asawen.
Azen Yuba ɣer daxel.
Azen asebtar.
Azen tabṛat-a s usafag.
Azen-asen tabrat.
Azen-d Yuba d akessar.
Azen-d Yuba ɣer da.
Azen-d ṣwab i cnawi.
Azen-it-id!
Azen-itt s tebṛat.
Azen-iyi-d tugna-nnek.
Azen-iyi-d tugna-nnem.
Azen-iyi-t-id imir-a.
Azen-t!
Azen.
Azgen ameqqran deg Leqbayel txuṣṣ-iten tefrit ɣef tamagit-nsen.
Azgen deg-sen ttawin-ten-id kan d timucuha deg tallit-nni tanammast.
Azgen n texbizt yif ulac.
Azgen n uxeddim-ik ifukk.
Azgen n uxeddim-im ifukk.
Azgen seg ccɣel-nni ifuk.
Azgen seg umahil-nni ifuk.
Azgen seg waya inek.
Azgen seg yimezrawen ban.
Azgen ɣer tqecwalt, azgen ɣer tɛebbuṭ-is.
Azger acerqi ittḥadar icc-is.
Azger d awlay n tfunast.
Azger ičča atemmu, tayuga tečča atemmu.
Azger unti-is d tafunast.
Azger yessen adaynin-is.
Azger yeɛqel gma-s.
Azger-is ikkat, wi iḥuza iṛẓa-t.
Aziḍud yettcabi ɣer yitbir.
Azlalam n Maziɣ d amaynut.
Azlem ay iḍaṛṛen-iw!
Azmez-a, ad yeqqim deg umezruy n umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt.
Azmumeg d afessas kan.
Azmumeg s wacu i tesfeǧǧeǧ zik axxam, yemzel.
Azmumeg yeqḍeɛ igezzem, acebbub d awezzlan d aqehwi d ubrin, d ilelli.
Aznemt tabṛat-a s usafag.
Aznemt-iyi ɣer din.
Aznemt-t s tebṛat.
Aznemt-tt s tebṛat.
Aznet tabṛat-a s usafag.
Aznet-iyi ɣer din.
Aznet-tt s tebṛat.

Dda Amer Mezdad
Dda Bṛahim inna i iqeddacen-is: Qqimet dagi kenwi d uɣyul.
Dda Bṛahim inna-as: Ɣur-k ad tawiḍ mmi ɣer dinna!
Dda Bṛahim irra-as i Feṛṛuǧa, inna: a-tt-an tqeddact-im ɣur-m.
Dda Bṛahim iǧǧa-d ayen akk yesɛa i Isḥaq.

Deg tegrest, ileqqeḍ azemmur.

Deg tegrest, tekkat lgerra aṭas yal ass.
Deg tejmaɛt mi d-tɛeddaḍ, tiṭ ur ad kem-tzeggel.
Deg temdint ara zedɣeɣ.
Deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu, ttmuddun-d yimezdaɣ-is aman i wid iteddun deg uɣamac n uzal qayli.
Deg temdint n Ɛennaba.
Deg temdint-a ay d-yenker.
Deg temkerḍit, teɣli-d tsusmi muhabet.
Deg temlilit taneggarut i d-yeḍran deg tlemmast n Lezzayer.
Deg temssizzelt n tazzla tezga-d Zehra d tamzwarut.
Deg temẓi tenna-yi yemma, ɣer temɣer yenna-yi baba.
Deg temẓi-w ksiɣ ulli d wakraren
Deg tenmehla ttmeslayeɣ s teqbaylit.
Deg tenwalt ay tettmahal?
Deg tesga n uxxam.
Deg tesnawit i d-tenǧer abrid-is.
Deg tesnawit i tt-ssneɣ.
Deg tesraft ar neγbu rric-is!
Deg tessirt, yella uberray, yeddewwir-it userdun.
Deg teswiɛt, ɛeddan-d akk wussan gar wallen-is.
Deg tesɣunt-a ad d-tafem agzul n tfaska.
Deg tezlatin-is, yessexleḍ deg yiɣaladen n uẓawan, gar-asen Yal n Takfarinas, Reggai, Latino, Ccaɛbi, d uẓawan aqbayli.
Deg teɣzi n setta n wayyuren, uɣaleɣ ttruḥuɣ ɣer uxxam n yimdukal-iw.
Deg tgara, ḥebseɣ ddexxan.
Deg tidet, Yuba yeḍsa-d.
Deg tidet, riɣ-kem.
Deg tidet, skerksen.
Deg tidet, skerksent.
Deg tidet, teskerkes.
Deg tidet, ur kem-riɣ ara.
Deg tidet, ur ken-riɣ ara.

Deg tidet, yeskerkes.
Deg tidet, ḥemmleɣ-k.
Deg tidet, ḥemmleɣ-kem.
Deg tikli-agi tis ɛecrin, nezmer ad d-nini hubben-d qeccuc meccuc ɣer temdinin n tmurt n Leqbayel.
Deg tikli-agi, daɣen, iban-d, ur qbilen ara yimesbaniyen, askasi-nni i d-yessumer uselway n uwanek Benṣalaḥ.
Deg tlemmast ixuss jiḥbuḍ.
Deg tlemmast ɣer uzelmaḍ.
Deg tmacahut, agrud ad yinig s tugna-s.
Deg tmeddit ɣer tmeddit, ad tafem afrag d lxali.
Deg tmeddit ɣer tmeddit, ruḥet ad teẓẓgem timcac.
Deg tmeɣriwin, yella usbuɣer yella ucekker.
Deg tmeɣriwin, yella usbuɣer, yella ucekker.
Deg tmucuha, inisi i iḥeṛcen ɣef uccen.
Deg tmurt ay d-nekreɣ.
Deg tmurt i deg ur ilaq ad tefɣeḍ zik uqbel tafat.
Deg tmurt i tetten arraw-is.
Deg tmurt i tezweǧ?
Deg tmurt i tzewǧem?
Deg tmurt i tzewǧemt?
Deg tmurt i tzewǧeḍ?
Deg tmurt i yezweǧ?
Deg tmurt i zewǧen?
Deg tmurt i zewǧent?
Deg tmurt n Ityupya i d-ufan lqahwa tikkelt tamezwarut.
Deg tmurt n Leqbayel neɣ deg Lezzayer sumata.
Deg tmurt n tmerrit ggten deg-s yisensa.
Deg tmurt tamesbaɣurt, ur ilaq ara ad ilin yimattaren.
Deg tmurt-iw, yella yiwen n yinzi i d-yeqqaren, win yewwi wasif, yeckunṭud ula deg yisennanen.
Deg tnarga-ya i tzedɣeḍ?
Deg tneɣrit llan isaḍufen, ara netbeɛ.
Deg tneɣrit ttɣimin deg yiwet n tgida.
Deg tsuret Imedyazen, ameskar n Leqran iwet-d deg wid akk yessefrawen.
Deg tudert, ayen yelhan d wayen n diri zgan ttnaɣen.
Deg tuget n tmura n Temrikt n Wenẓul s tespenyult i ttmeslayen.
Deg tuget, amawal-nni ulac-it, ilaq ad t-id-tesnulfuḍ.
Deg tugna yettwali.
Deg tullisin-is yeqqar kan: “yewweḍ-d i zzwaj, kkren ad s-d-xeḍben”.
Deg tullist tilawt neɣ ungal ilaq ad iban wakud.
Deg tulya n tedwilt-agi n usileɣ, iberreḥ-d uneɣlaf n usegmi aɣelnaw, Ɛabdelḥakim Bellabed.
Deg tuɣalin ɣer tesdawit deg useggas-iw wis tlata.
Deg tzeqqa n uraju, ttrajuɣ nnuba-w.
Deg tɣiwant n At Smaɛel.
Deg ublug-inu, llan ddeqs n yiḍrisen iseklanen.
Deg ublug-iw, tzemrem ad tafem aṭas n yiḍrisen iseklanen.
Deg ubrid mi teddun, mi d uwḍen ɣer wasif-nni.
Deg ubrid temlal ṛebɛa, mačči zaɛma tmuqqel-iten.
Deg udrar ukffadu.
Deg ugerjum yebleɛ wawal,ɣas ma ur d-nenṭiq neḍlem.
Deg ugraw n Ssumam i yeḍran deg ɣuct walef u ttɛemya u setta u xemsin.
Deg ugraw n Ssumam n ɣuct agim d tẓa n twinas d semmus n tmerwin d sḍis.
Deg ugraw n Ṣṣumam yuɣal d aɛeggal n Useqqamu Aɣelnaw n Tegrawla Tazzayrit.
Deg ukala s wayes yettaɣ amkan di tmetti, am wakken daɣen tettekki deg-s tmeslayt.

Deg ul tin ad yettṣuḍun.
Deg ul-ik wwet ajenwi.
Deg ulawen d ayen nniḍen.
Deg umkan anda ssurugen iɣiɣden ara yerɣ.

Deg unebdu d azɣal ɣur-neɣ.
Deg unebdu isaffen ttɣaren.
Deg unebdu, d aẓɣal.

Deg unebdu-nni kan tedda d tislit.
Deg unebdu-nni, yal azal nettɛedday s ugiṭar d dderbuka.
Deg uneẓruf, agdud meṛṛa n Isṛayil ttlummun di Musa akked Haṛun.
Deg uniwel n leqbayel.
Deg usamar n Bgayet, ideg ɛerḍen wid iḥeḍren ad walin liḥala n yigḍaḍ-a n waman.
Deg usebter-nsen n facebook neɣ deg usebter n tesɣunt neɣ deg yigrawen i d-yessemliliyen iselmaden n tmaziɣt.

Deg usensu ay tella?

Deg usensu-a ay telliḍ?

Deg wasif kan ara d-qqimen.
Deg wasmi d-luleɣ akka.

Di sin ad t-nebnu, s zzux d tnefxa.
Di sin igiman u yiwen mmuten meyya u tlatin iqbayliyen ɣef tugdut, tutlayt, yidles...

Di sin uqbel ad ɣ-teččar.
Di snat tiqcicin-nni sɛant cbaḥa yessewhamen.
Di taddart medden akk ad slen.
Di taddart n Ayt Tɛisiwt yella yekker umennuɣ gar snat n tamiwin.
Di taggara, Mhenni yerra-as tajmilt i weltma-s Kaysa.
Di taggara, nessaram ad d-slen yimsaɣen i taɣect-is.

Di tallit tamezwarut.
Di tallit taneggarut.

Di tazwara baba ur yecliɛ ara.
Di tazwara nnuɣeɣ akk s wayen i yellan deg tezmert-iw.
Di tazwara, Illu yexleq igenwan d lqaɛa.
Di tazwara, mačči akka i yella lḥal.
Di tazwara, tella tettcukku deg-s, lameɛna tura ulac din ccek.
Di tazwara, timenɣiwt-is d lexsaṛa meqqren i ccna s umata d tezlit taqbaylit ladɣa.
Di tazzwara ugadeɣ-ten.
Di tecmatin kan i teẓwer.

Gar Sidi-ɛic d Sedduq.
Gar cwiṭ, d waṭas.
Gar sin n yisegra tettawi tettara adida.
Gar tallunt ed wakud.
Gar temsal-agi, aseqdec n uwfus aɣurbiz, d wugur n tsebḍut i d-ttmaggaren yiselmaden.
Gar temsizelt n tmedyazt, timsikniyin, ameslay ɣef tmeddurt d umecawar n lal n tejmilt Anisa.
Gar tizya-s d ddehb d ubriz.
Gar tlawin-a ad naf: Faḍma n Summer.
Gar tunṭiqin n snitra, gar tefyar n tira.
Gar tuɣmas d wugel.
Gar unebdu d nnisan jebbden wussan.
Gar usmekti n uzarug d umennuɣ n umussu.
Gar uɣersiw meṛṛa yesmulḥucen, wigi ḥesbet-ten neǧsen.
Gar warrac akked tullas, di tlata utlatin yid-sen.
Gar wayen i d-ibanen deg wulɣu n tddukkla timsuddest, ad yili umḥizwer n snat tmerwin d kraḍ n yicennayen.
Gar wid i d-yeslulen Tuddsa Timeẓlit n Umussu i Trennawt n Tlelliyin Timagdayin.
Gar wid i d-yeslulen Tuddsa Tuzzigt n Umussu i Trennawt n Tlelliyin Timagdayin.

Gar yiccer d uksum.

Gar yigenni ed tmurt.
Gar yisaragen d tmeɣriwin akked waddal.
Gar yisenfaren-agi, tamkerḍit n tɣiwant yebdan deg useggas n sin yigiman d ṣa, ar ass-a urεad tekfi.
Gar yiswiyen n ugraw-a Asaru, d asebɣes d tmerna n ufud i wid ixeddmen ssinima taqbaylit.
Gar yiznan-a.
Gar yizri, d yizri ibaw.
Gar yiḍarren i yettnus wayen i yesɣemlen akk tikta.
Gar zik d tura deg tmurt n leqbayel.

Gar-aneɣ kan, tella tuḍen.

Leqbayel aten-a deg umihi.
Leqbayel d neyyat ad mmten d neyyat deg tsartit. Mazal lxir ɣer zdat.

Leqbayel tečča-ten tmes.
Leqdic igerrzen!
Leqdic ilaq ad yili, ɣas gar yiɛewwiqen. Akken tizlit taqbaylit ad tezbu, ad tesɛu imal yelhan.
Leqdic la ileḥḥu s ttawil.
Leqdic n Ben Muḥemmed ijeddel tikli i tedwilin tidelsanin.
Leqdic n tqeddacin cciεa n tceṭṭaḥin.
Leqdic yella-d s ddeqs n temsikniyin, yerzan tudert d umecwar n ucennay aqbayli.
Leqdic-a, icudd ɣer ddeqs n tussniwin gar-asent: Tasnilest, asefser awurman n tultayt, tusnakt, tigzi tamacinant.
Leqdic-agi, d atiknikan yebna ɣef tiktiwin tineggura deg tetiknulujiyin timaynutin.
Leqdic-agi, yuɣal d tajmilt i yimyurar iqdimen i yemmuten.
Leqdic-ines d asired n yiqejduren n tkuzint akked wid ideg ččan yikelyanen.
Leqdic-is yif leqdic-iw.
Leqdic-nneɣ ɣas akken d ussnan, mazal-it deg timmeɣnest acku ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit kan ara nqeddec.

Mačči d tirza-nsen tamezwarut ɣer dinna, imi usan-d yakan ɣer Udrar n Takkuct.
Mačči d tisdawiyin ara d-iseknen i medden amek ara meslayen.
Mačči d tisdawiyin ara iḍebbṛen ɣef amek ara tili teqbaylit.

Mačči d ufur ara neǧǧ dima.
Mačči d ungif, d asekṛan.
Mačči d urar n yidrimen.
Mačči d urar.
Mačči d wid ur nuri ula d tafyirt s teqbaylit ara yesbedden takadimit.

Mačči d win yeṣfan akk.
Mačči d yir aterras.

Mačči d yiwen kan i kksen.

Mačči d yiwen wass ad yecnu, acku yebbeḥbeḥ.

Mačči deg tbanant i teqqim!

Mbawel sya.
Mbaṭel.
Mbeɛb, irna-d gma-s, afus-is iṭṭef deg ugerz n Meẓyan.
Mbeɛd ad d-ffɣen syenna s ssɛaya tameqrant.
Mbeɛd aneḥbus ɣef leqraya i wazal n ddurt.
Mbeɛd as-d, tebɛ-iyi.
Mbeɛd awal n tazwara n unemhal n uɣerbaz-a amenzu.
Mbeɛd ayagi, ad ffɣeɣ.
Mbeɛd aḥemmal-nni ameqran, sɛan-d arrac.
Mbeɛd indem, dɣa iṛuḥ.
Mbeɛd iṛuḥ izdeɣ di Girar.
Mbeɛd iṛuḥ si tmurt.
Mbeɛd leqdic d unadi d leɛtab n wacḥal d aseggas.
Mbeɛd mi cnan ihellilen ulin s iɣil n Uzemmur.
Mbeɛd mi mḥezwarent snat n tuddar-a Saḥel di Buzgan akked Lqelɛa n At Ɛebbas deg Yiɣil Ɛli di Bgayet.
Mbeɛd mi t-ṣellben, ferqen llebsa-s s tesɣart.
Mbeɛd mi teɛedda twaɣit-agi, teḍra-d tayeḍ i tt-yecban.
Mbeɛd mi yekker uxxam ad yelḥu deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri.
Mbeɛd neffu ɣer Babil, Yaxunya yesɛa-d Caltiyil.
Mbeɛd sebɛa n wussan n tikli, ilḥeq-it s adrar n Gilɛad.
Mbeɛd talalit n Dda Crif, Ramḍan iɛac mitin n iseggasen.
Mbeɛd talalit n Mahalalil, Qiynan iɛac tmen meyya u ṛebɛin n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Nuḥ, Limix iɛac xems meyya u xemsa u ttsɛin n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Qiynan, Anuc iɛac tmen meyya u xemseṭṭac n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Sarug, Raɛu iɛac mitin u sebɛa n iseggasen.
Mbeɛd talalit n Yirid, Mahalalil iɛac tmen meyya utlatin n iseggwasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd tirza ɣer uẓekka n Meksa, deffir-s kan ad ilint ddeqs n tnagiyin, ɣef tudert n ucennay-agi ilemẓi.
Mbeɛd tulya tunṣibt n tfaska-a, ad tebdu temsizzelt s timmad-is, gar snat tmerwin d kraḍ n yilmeẓyen.
Mbeɛd yuɣal-d ikemmel lhedṛa yid-sen.
Mbeɛd, Isḥaq iserreḥ-asen, uɣalen di lehna.
Mbeɛd, iceggeɛ-asen mmi-s.
Mbeɛd, iderman n Kanɛan mfaṛaqen.
Mbeɛd, imudd asfel-nni n ugdud.
Mbeɛd, tesɛa-d taqcict, tsemma-yas Dina.
Mbeɛd, tizlit-nni “Tulawin” n Crif Ḥamani, i d-ɣennant tullas n terbaɛt n ccna n Tdukkkla Imnar n Tdukli.
Mbeɛd, ttarran ablaḍ-nni s amkan-is, ɣef yimi n lbir.
Mbeɛd, uɣal ad tefkeḍ lweɛda-k.
Mbeεd mi i d-yessufeɣ snat n tesfifin iiwumi yefka izwal: “Anda ara kem-afeɣ” d « Mi d-mmektaɣ”.

Mi yeččuṛ, ad t-id-jebden iḥewwaten ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ.
Mi yeɛra yiɣes, ad ak-t-id-yefk.
Mi yeɛya yeqqim fell-as ad yesgunfu.
Mi yeɣli uzger, ṭṭuqqten tferyin.
Mi yeɣli yiṭij, iɣli-d ɣef Dda Bṛahim yiwen n naddam d ameqran.
Mi yeɣli yiṭij, iɣli-d ṭṭlam uṭellis.
Mi yeḥma yiṭij, ayen i d-ittɣimin ifetti.
Mi yi-d-tenna akka, ɣliɣ-d deg nnheq n yimeṭṭi am uqcic amecṭuḥ.
Mi yi-d-tesɛeddaḍ sya.
Mi yimɣur, yetɛeqqel.
Mi yuker ḥedreɣ mi yeggul umneɣ!
Mi yuker ḥedreɣ, mi yeggul umneɣ.
Mi yuweḍ ɣer lɣerba, yettxemmim kan fell-as.
Mi ččan am yizgaren, ṭṭsen.
Mi ččiɣ imensi, ffɣeɣ ɣer berra ad dduɣ cwiṭ.
Mi ɛeddan kraḍ waguren terfed tadist.
Mi ɛeddan sḥab n tmenṭac, ay igeḍman n remman.
Mi ɛeddan ɛecra n wayyuren, uɣaleɣ ɣer uxeddim.
Mi ɛellqent aẓeṭṭa, ɛeddant snat sneltent-d ilni syen grent-d asaru.
Mi ɣaben yizmawen, ad sreɛrɛen yiḍan.
Mi ṭṭuqtent, gganent.
Mi ẓdiɣ, ad ig Ṛebbi tsaq!
Midyan iǧǧa-d: Ɛiyfa, Ɛifiṛ, Ḥanux, Abidaɛ akked Ildaɛa.

Mured.
Musa akked Haṛun kecmen s aqiḍun n temlilit.
Musa akked Haṛun xedmen akken i d-yessendeh Umeɣlal.
Musa akked Haṛun xedmen akken i sen-d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal.
Musa akked Ilya ḍehren-asen-d.
Musa iburek-iten.
Musa ihdeṛ i wat Uɣrib.
Musa iheddeṛ, Illu yettarra-as-d si tlemmast n ṛṛɛud.
Musa iɛawed i Umeɣlal ayen akken i s-d-inna ugdud.
Musa iɛeggeḍ ɣer Umeɣlal, inna-as: D acu ara xedmeɣ i ugdud-agi?
Musa iɣawel ikna ɣer lqaɛa, iseǧǧed.
Musa iɣumm udem-is, axaṭer yugad ad imuqel ɣer Yillu.
Musa iḍegger asɣar-nni s aman, imiren aman-nni uɣalen ḥlawit.
Musa iṛucc s idammen-nni, idisan meṛṛa n uɛalṭar.
Musa iṛuḥ, iɛawed i Umeɣlal ayen akken i s-d-inna ugdud.
Musa iṣubb s agdud, ihdeṛ-asen.
Musa tekcem-it tugdi, inna: Slan akk medden s temsalt-agi!
Musa yeddem tameṭṭut-is d warraw-is, isserkeb-iten ɣef yiɣyal, dɣa ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n At Jennad.
Musa yeffeɣ-d sɣur Ferɛun, iɛenna ɣer Umeɣlal.
Musa yekker netta d Yacuɛa, amɛiwen-is, yuli s adrar n Yillu.
Musa yekker-d isellek-itent seg-sen, dɣa yessew taqeḍɛit-nsent.
Musa yenna i Ferɛun: Ḥaca-k, ay agellid!
Musa yenna i Haṛun: D acu i k-ixdem ugdud-agi armi i t-teǧǧiḍ ixdem ddnub yecban wagi?
Musa yenna i Umeɣlal: A-t-an tenniḍ-iyi-d: Awi agdud-agi!
Musa yenna i Umeɣlal: Di leɛnaya-k, a Sidi!
Musa yenna-asen: D ayen i d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal.
Musa yenna-asen: Ur ttagadet ara!
Musa yenna-asen: ɣur-wat win ara d-iǧǧen seg-s i ṣṣbeḥ.
Musa yenna-yasen: wwtet-tt ihi, ass-agi.
Musa yenna: ad d-zziɣ i inijel akken ad waliɣ d acu-t leɛǧeb-agi!
Musa yeqsed ad izdeɣ s argaz-nni.
Musa yerra afus-is deg iciwi-s, mi t-id-ikkes, yuɣal ufus-is d amellal am udfel si lberṣ.
Musa yerra-as: Mi ara ffɣeɣ seg uxxam-ik, ad ɛenniɣ ɣer Umeɣlal.
Musa yerra-as: Wagi d aɛekkaz.
Musa yerra-asen: Acuɣer akka i tettnadim ccwal?
Musa yesbedd aqiḍun n temlilit, isers tikersiyin, issuli tincirin, isɛedda iɛmuden, isbedd tigejda.
Musa yexdem akken zdat n imeqranen n Isṛayil.
Musa yexdem ayen akk i s-d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal, akken i yexdem.
Musa yezla-t, iṛucc s idammen-is aɛalṭar meṛṛa.
Musa yuli s adrar, dɣa tagut tɣumm adrar.
Musa yura ayen akk i s-d-inna Umeɣlal.
Musa yuɣ awal i uḍeggal-is, ixdem ayen akk i s-d-inna.
Musa yuɣal ɣer tmurt.
Musa, iqbel ayen akken i s-d-inna Haṛun.

Nnan ur yettali wass, ɣef win yewwin daεwessu imawlan.

Nnan yemmut deg ṭṭrad, ma d tidett neɣ d tikerkas

Nnan-as.

Sya ar yimir, s umedyez ad d-nettmlil deg Yiflisen Umellil.

Sya d afella, ad d-nheggi yiwen.
Sya d asawen ur ttɣamaɣ ara din.
Sya ɣer da ad tẓebreḍ, ad tessusiḍ.
Sya ɣer da yegguni-iyi leḥbis d ustaɛfu.

Syen akkin ad zellin tisigert i ugdud.
Syenna Yasuɛ ikemmel abrid.
Syenna ara s-d-tawiḍ tameṭṭut i mmi.
Syenna yexfa, axaṭer iṛfedɛ-it neɣ irfed-it Yillu.
Syenna, iṛuḥ, yuɣal s axxam-is.
Syin akin deg unebdu, ad tili yiwet n tesɣert taɣelnawt.
Syin akkin d anamzul n uselway deg useggas n wagim d tẓa n twinas d sḍis n tmerwin d yiwen.
Syin akkin d anamzul n uselway deg walef u ttɛemya u waḥ€d u settin.
Syin akkin, yebda ufraq n warrazen ɣef yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg yal tasmilt.
Syin akkin, yuɣal s axxam.
Syin deg unebdu, ad nruḥ ɣer teftisin anda ara yili, daɣen, leqdic meqqren i yeɛnan awellah n umsider.
Syin ikemmel amennuɣ deg urebbi n umussu adelsan amaziɣ.
Syin tebda teqqar aẓawan n cceɛbi deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu.
Syin yedhem-d ccwal, yerẓa-d tiwwura, yenneqlab uxxam-a ɣef uqerru-is, yiwen ur yefhim d acu i iḍerrun.
Syin yennerna unamek n wawal deg uḍris.
Syin yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt deg walef u ttɛemya u ṛebɛa u xemsin.
Syin ɣer Merruk.
Syin ɣer-s ɣer yimerẓi i d-yellan gar yiwen n usdawan d yiwen n uselmad deg ugezdu-a.
Syin ɣer-s, ad yili wass-nniḍen, ad nemmeslay ɣef lemḍarrat n yisufar n tgella ladɣa deg unebdu.
Syin ɣur-s, yeqqim ɛecra n yiseggasen, i wakken ad yernu tasfift-is taneggarut, iwumi iga isem Fliksi-as-d.
Syin, ad nefru taluft akken i d-tewwi.
Syin, ikemmel abrid d asawen akked Mennad, cergen lebḥer d abrid ɣer tmurt n tirga.
Syin, ssawlen i Budyaf ɣer Merruk i waken ad yuɣal d aselwaya n Lezzayer imi ttwaḥebsent tefranin.
Syin, ssawlen i Buḍyaf ɣer Merruk iwakken ad yuɣal d aselway n Lezzayer imi ttwaḥebsent tefranin.
Syin, tigzi n tmacint i as-yettwaskecmen ad d-teṭṭef tugna akken ad tsuneḍ i yiɣil-is ad yebdu asuneɣ.
Syin, ttuferqen warrazen akked yigerdasen i snat n trebbuyaɛ-agi.
Syin, ttɛeddayen-d yicennayen yiwen yiwen i tiwin n tezlatin i d-heyyan ilmend n tejmilt-a.
Syin, yessawel-d i yiwen n lǧar-is yeččuren d nneyya daɣ am netta.
Syin, yettwanɣa srid deg wass n tesɛa uɛecrin yunyu alef u ttɛemya u tniyen u ttsɛin deg temdint n Ɛennaba.
Syin, yettwanɣa srid deg wass n tesεa u εecrin deg yunyu alef u tesεemya u tnin u tesεin.
Syin, yuɣal d imḍebber n "Le groupe de choc" yettabaɛen akabar n Tirni n uslelli aɣelnaw.

Tala n tjaddit
Talaba, teɛǧeb win i tt-yersan mačči d win i tt-yeẓḍan.

Talsa teǧǧa-tt leḥnana.

Tameddit
Tameddit akk nettat tessewway.
Tameddit igerrzen.

Tameddit yelhan.

Tasebba n waya tban.
Tasebbalt ma tneggi, asagem iwumi?
Tasebḥit, yenṭeq urgaz γer uεeṭṭar ameẓyan: Ay arfiq.
Tasedda d tawtemt n yizem.
Tasedda tetturebba-d deg twacult i as-d-iheggan immal-is d ubrid ara taɣ send ad d-tlal.
Tasedda, d yiwet n tlemẓit taqbaylit i d-yekkren am tullas akk n tudrin.
Taseddast teḥkem, axaṭer ma ur tettmeslayeḍ ara akken ur tt-fehmen ara medden.

Tikkelt-a ad t-ɛerḍeɣ.
Tikkelt-a azemmur yurew ma d ilindi ulac maḍi.

Tikkelt-agi mačči d netta i d as-d-yerran.

Tikkelt-nniḍen.

Tikwal ma d-teffeɣ.
Tikwal nessexdam ayen akk qessiḥen.

Tikwal yessagad-iten.

Tikwal yettbin-iyi-d lḥal qrib ad tenger.
Tikwal ɛeyyuɣ deg tikli.
Tikwal ɣas s lḥiǧab ad k-teɛǧeb teqcict.

Tilaq ad nḥader ugar.
Tilaq tusiḍ-d yid-neɣ.

Tileggit-nni d taɛlayant.
Tilelli n Sami tekfa.
Tilelli n teflest d azref seg izerfan n wemdan.
Tilelli n tefrit ur telli deg tmurt-a-nneɣ.
Tilelli n tuzzuft.
Tilelli n umeslay tettwagdel di tmurt n lezzayer.

Tilelli s wazal-is.
Tilelli tesɛa azal.
Tilelli ula i tmeṭṭut-ik d yelli-k, mačči i tiyaḍ kan.
Tilelli umeslay ur telli ɣur-sen.
Tilelli ur tesliḥ; ḥaca ma tessxedmeḍ-tt.
Tilelli ur tettnuz ara.

Uh ur d-neclig ara.

Ukzɣ

Umneɣ aya.
Umneɣ s tmelsa-ines.
Umneɣ s Ṛebbi yiwen.
Umneɣ yiwen wass taqbaylit ad d-yeflali fell-as yiṭij.
Umneɣ Ḥasan.
Umneɣ-k ay uccen, teččiḍ-iyi iɣiden.
Umneɣ-k.
Umneɣ-kem.
Umneɣ-ken.
Umneɣ-kent.
Umneɣ-t.
Umneɣ-tt.
Umreɣ imi ay k-yeɛjeb Caɛban U Sliman.
Umreɣ imi ay rebḥen.
Umreɣ imi ay sliɣ aya.
Umreɣ imi ay t-ẓriɣ.
Umreɣ imi ay ẓriɣ Si Ḥmed Waɛli.
Umreɣ yes-k s tidet.
Umreɣ yes-m s tidet.
Umsen yiceṭṭiḍen n Susan.
Umsen yidrimen-nni.
Umuɣ n yinelmaden n uswir wis ukkuẓ ɣezzif cwiṭ.
Umuɣ n yisenfaren i d aɣ-d-ikecmen yugar ayen nurǧa.
Unan iẓra belli dderya ara d-isɛu ur tettili ara d ayla-s.
Undiɣ i yilfan.
Undrulog d amejjay n yergazen.
Unfen i lmal ad iɛeddi.
Unfen i lmal ad iεeddi.
Unfen-iyi ad ruḥeɣ.
Unfeɣ i tfekka-w ad tefsi s uslufu-s ḥninen.
Unfeɣ-akent.
Unfeɣ-as ad teglilez deg tikta-w, deg tirga-w d yiman-iw.
Ungal n tikkelt-a, war ccek, aṭas diɣ n ubaɣur ara yaf yimeɣri deg-s, acku d win yesɛan azal.
Ungal tirga n wul d win i d-yeffɣen deg tiẓrigin Tafat.
Ungal yesɛa ilugan-is, mačči win yekkren ad yaru.
Ungal, mačči kan d tulsin n teqsiṭ.
Ungal-a yewɛer i lefhama.
Ungal-nnes yenza mliḥ.
Ungal-nni d apulaṛ.
Ungif ur d-gri ara deg tudert-is.
Ungif!
Ungifen ttɛuzzun tuyat.
Unguf imesxen tala.
Unuɣen urmiden mačči i imecṭaḥ kan ay mmugen.
Unzen.
Unzent.
Unzeɣ s ḍḍrafa.
Unzeɣ.
Uqbel Aseggas ɣer deffir iyi-d-yebda kullec.
Uqbel ad akem-tenṭeḍ.
Uqbel ad fakkeɣ asekfel deg wallaɣ-iw akken ad d-afeɣ leḥdaqa s wacu ara as-sfehmeɣ.
Uqbel ad medlent walen.
Uqbel ad nesali tadiwennit-a, acu n yizen i tebɣiḍ ad tessiwḍeḍ i medden?
Uqbel ad tefɣeḍ sefqed i tkerrust-ik ma ulac d acu i tt-ixuṣṣen.
Uqbel ad tekcem aɣerbaz.
Uqbel ad teldi tawwurt i trewla, iḥer-itt ɣer tbankiṭ.
Uqbel ad yaweḍ lemijal.
Uqbel ad ṭṭreḍqent tersasin n dɣel d tisselbi.
Uqbel ara t-id-yeǧǧ.
Uqbel ara tzegreḍ abrid, muqel akka d wakka.
Uqbel aya, tamdint-nni isem-is Luz.
Uqmen-as algam.

Yusef Awcic iɛedda s ukabar n Tirni n Yiɣallen Inemlayen.
Yusef Awcic, d aselway n useqqamu aɣerfan n ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu.
Yusef di lḥebs Mbeɛd ayagi meṛṛa, tameṭṭut n ssid-is terfed allen-is ɣer Yusef, tenna-yas: Ṭṭeṣ yid-i!
Yusef ihdeṛ-asen s leḥnana, isseṛtaḥ lxaṭer-nsen.
Yusef ijemɛ-d irden s waṭas, amzun d ṛṛmel n lebḥeṛ.
Yusef ikna ɣer baba-s, issuden-it, ittru.
Yusef ildi akk lemxazen, issaǧaw irden i Imaṣriyen.
Yusef inna i ugdud: Ass-agi, uɣeɣ-ken i Ferɛun, s kenwi, s tferkiwin-nwen.
Yusef inna i watmaten-is: Aql-i ad mmteɣ!
Yusef inna i watmaten-is: Qeṛṛbet-d ɣur-i!
Yusef inna-as: Ad xedmeɣ akken i t-id-tenniḍ.
Yusef inna-asen: D acu-t ṛṛay-agi i txedmem?
Yusef inna-asen: Ɛni mačči ɣer Yillu i tella tifrat?
Yusef inna-yasen: D lekdeb!
Yusef inna-yasen: D lmuḥal ad xedmeɣ ayagi!
Yusef inna-yasen: Fket tiqeḍɛiyin-nwen!
Yusef inna-yasen: Fket tiqeḍɛiyinnwen!
Yusef inna-yasen: Ur ttagadet ara!
Yusef irra-yas i Ferɛun: Mačči d nekk!
Yusef irra-yas: Aql-i!
Yusef isɛa-d sin n warrac di tmurt n Maṣer.

Ɣer taggara ufiɣ txedmeḍ anadi ameqqran ɣef yismawen n yidigan n dinna.
Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti belli tafaska-a, llant deg-s aṭas n tewsatin n tẓuri d yidles.
Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti kan belli seldazekka n larebɛa, ad tili ṭṭhara n yigerdan-agi deg ssbiṭer n Tigzirt.

Ɣer taggara, tettwasaẓ tuffɣa n walbum-ik amaynut.

ɛni d nekk i d aɛessas n gma?
ɣef wayagi, ini i wat Isṛayil: Nekk, d Ameɣlal.
Γef waya akk, amdan ara yegren afus deg uslugen n tutlayt d tamasit tameqqrant.
Γef waya ur zmireɣ ara ad aruɣ yis-s, axater ur ssineɣ ara ilugan-is akken iwata.
Γer taggara n tefsut, tekkaw tegnawt, teḥma tmurt.
Γeḍlen-d fell-as buseṭṭaf.

Ẓṛiɣ aqjun.
Ẓṛiɣ aydi.
Ẓṛiɣ belli Tom meẓẓi fell-i.
Ẓṛiɣ belli ad yerbeḥ Tom.
Ẓṛiɣ belli ad yerbeḥ ɛemmi Muḥ.
Ẓṛiɣ belli d Tom i imeẓẓiyen fell-i.
Ẓṛiɣ belli d asiwel n Caɛban U Sliman.
Ẓṛiɣ belli d asiwel n Tom.
Ẓṛiɣ d acu i s-tennam.
Ẓṛiɣ d acu i s-tennamt.
Ẓṛiɣ d acu i s-tenniḍ.
Ẓṛiɣ d acu-t.
Ẓṛiɣ d acu-tt.
Ẓṛiɣ dacu i bɣiɣ.
Ẓṛiɣ dacu i xeddmeɣ.
Ẓṛiɣ dakken ɣuṛ-i lḥeɣ.
Ẓṛiɣ kullec.
Ẓṛiɣ tesɛam lḥeq.
Ẓṛiɣ tesɛamt lḥeq.
Ẓṛiɣ tesɛiḍ lḥeq.
Ẓṛiɣ walebɛaḍ issuden Tom.
Ẓṛiɣ Ḥasan.
Ẓṛiɣ, d asemmaḍ wayen.
Ẓṛiɣ, d tasemmaḍt tinna.
Ẓṛiɣ-t ass-a.
Ẓṛiɣ.
Ẓẓaden, ggaren awren.
Ẓẓal s wul-ik.
Ẓẓan isekla.
Ẓẓaren Dan.
Ẓẓaren-t.
Ẓẓarent-t.
Ẓẓareɣ Dan.
Ẓẓareɣ Ḥasan.
Ẓẓareɣ-t kan tikkal.
Ẓẓareɣ-t.
Ẓẓay aṭas uselkim-a.
Ẓẓay aṭas usenduq-a.
Ẓẓay ccɣel-ik.
Ẓẓay fell-ak wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-am wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-am wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-as wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-as wawal?

Ẓẓay fell-asen wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-asent wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-asent wawal?

Ẓẓay fell-awen wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-aɣ wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-i wawal.
Ẓẓay i reffu!
Ẓẓay maca zemreɣ-as.
Ẓẓay mačči d afessas.
Ẓẓay ublaḍ-nni.
Ẓẓay uqerruy-is.
Ẓẓay Ḥasan.
Ẓẓay-it ṛwan.
Ẓẓayet fell-as s waṭas.
Ẓẓayet maca zemreɣ-as.
Ẓẓayet tbalizt-a.
Ẓẓayet ur s-zmireɣ ara.
Ẓẓayeḍ i ccɣel.
Ẓẓayit igerrumen-a.
Ẓẓaẓneɣ.
Ẓẓebra n umzil ẓẓayet nezzeh.
Ẓẓebra ẓẓayet, d uzzal.
Ẓẓed.
Ẓẓeg.
Ẓẓel afus-ik, tbeɛ-it!
Ẓẓel afus-ik, tettebɛeḍ-t.
Ẓẓel iɣallen-ik.
Ẓẓel iɣallen-im.
Ẓẓel, ur ttewliwil ara.
Ẓẓel.
Ẓẓerb yeqmeḍ uffu.
Ẓẓeǧǧ tacekkart n walim i uḥeggan.
Ẓẓeṭla d zzit uzemmur, iṭij abeḥri tili.
Ẓẓgen tafunast-nni.
Ẓẓgent tafunast-nni.
Ẓẓgeɣ tafunast-nni.
Ẓẓher bu iɣisi.
Ẓẓher i sɛiɣ.
Ẓẓher iruḥen ur iban.
Ẓẓher-is yečča-t umcic, yewwi-t deg tfesqa.
Ẓẓher-iw i ẓriɣ yeɛkes.
Ẓẓher-iw isem-is fiḥel.
Ẓẓher-iw yeẓheḍ tabburt.
Ẓẓiɣ acaruq n yiṭij mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ.
Ẓẓiɣ baṭaṭa di tebḥirt-nneɣ akked yemma.
Ẓẓiɣ ddeqs n tleqqamin.
Ẓẓiɣ imɣi n lwerd ɣef ubalkun.
Ẓẓiɣ leǧnan d imselles, lxux d ifires.
Ẓẓiɣ taneqlet.
Ẓẓiɣ tibḥirt deg Izubaq.
Ẓẓiɣ yiwen.
Ẓẓiɣ yiwet.
Ẓẓiḍer.
Ẓẓlemt iɣallen-nkumt.
Ẓẓlen ɣef tgertilt.
Ẓẓlen.
Ẓẓlent.
Ẓẓlet iɣallen-nwen.
Ẓẓleɣ ɣef umeṭreḥ-iw.
Ẓẓleɣ ɣef umeṭreḥ.
Ẓẓleɣ.
Ẓẓu isekla!
Ẓẓu lebṣel, ad tertiḥeḍ.
Ẓẓulen akk.
Ẓẓulen meṛṛa.
Ẓẓullen.
Ẓẓullent deg temkarḍit.
Ẓẓullent.
Ẓẓulleɣ.
Ẓẓur d lfuci imeεfan.
Ẓẓur deg-neɣ yetḥennec.
Ẓẓur fell-as yeckunṭeḍ.
Ẓẓur i lǧid, d asalas.
Ẓẓɛen-t seg uxeddim.
Ẓẓɛen-t-id seg uxeddim.

Ẓẓɛeɣ-t.
